metadata.name: The Trials Of Isaac
metadata.description:
[h1]Adds thoughtfully designed, fun and tricky challenges to The Binding Of Isaac[/h1]
[b]Current Challenges include:[/b]
- [b] ICU [/b] - Control a big tear in the darkness with a flashlight
- [b] Ring of smoke [/b] - Shoot bombs around you in a circle!
- [b] Hereeee's Isaac! [/b] - Control a knife around the room
- [b] ICU? - [/b] Similar to ICU - but without darkness and your tears are trickier to control
- [b] The Fidget Spinner [/b] - You cannot shoot, but you can use a spinning disk which spins itself and some flies that orbit you. You can also fly
- [b] Dr.Pills [/b] - Each run is based around getting as many pills as you can, they are all positive ones! So go wild!
- [b] Apollyon the Astrologer [/b] - Start off as Apollyon with a few astrology based items
- [b] Conjurer of Milk [/b] - Your body and mind are one with the power of electrified Milk!
[h2]I am already working on adding more challenges, please leave any suggestions in the comments! :)[/h2]
